channel.title: How to fix custom item drops?

item.title: How to fix custom item drops?
item.dc:creator: @pure_mages_r pure mages r
item.description:
@pure_mages_r wrote:

server side, have u had the idea of logging in using silabsoft downloadable client and checking if the item picked up without your client? If it still happens then the coding in your server files is messed up. had same problem a while ago, then i fixed it cause im G

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix custom item drops?

item.title: How to fix custom item drops?
item.dc:creator: @pepse43 pepse43
item.description:
@pepse43 wrote:

I have added custom items to my server but every time i drop them and try to pickup them up it has the option to do

â€¦(item name)
take(item name)
walk here
examin(item name)
cancle

How do i fix it to where its just

take(item name)
walk here
examin(item name)
cancle

For example, gold santahat

if(i == 10096) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 7114; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 10351; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 7097; class8.anInt174 = 2537; class8.anInt181 = 540; class8.anInt190 = 72; class8.anInt198 = 136; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -3; class8.anInt165 = 189; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt200 = 366; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = 69; class8.anInt197 = 127; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Gold santa hat "; class8.aByteArray178 = "Gold santa hat.".getBytes(); }

and it comes up like this when i drop it and try to pick it up

Is this on the client or source side?

Read full topic
